abstract: United States Anti-Doping Agency files documents in Texas court seeking to compel deposition from endocrinologist Jeffrey S Brown as part of investigation into doping among track and field athletes training under coach Alberto Salazar; Brown is known for diagnosing hyperthyroidism, which is treated with controversial hormone therapy.
lead_paragraph: The endocrinologist Jeffrey S. Brown is being examined as part of an investigation of the prominent coach Alberto Salazar, a person familiar with the investigation said.

headline.main: U.S. Antidoping Agency Seeks to Depose Doctor Who Treated Top Track Athletes
headline.print_headline: Usada Seeks to Ask Doctor About Care of Track Stars

snippet: The endocrinologist Jeffrey S. Brown is being examined as part of an investigation of the prominent coach Alberto Salazar, a person familiar with the investigation said.
